mapper.select: SELECT cct.ct_idx, cc.ca_name, cct.ct_wish_start, cct.ct_wish_end, ccc.cc_crew, ccc.cc_is_join, cct.ct_end FROM cp_crew_together cct JOIN cp_camping_crew ccc on ccc.ct_idx = cct.ct_idx JOIN cp_camping cc ON cc.ca_idx = cct.ca_idx WHERE ccc.mb_id = #{param1} AND cct.ct_idx not in (select bb_relation_idx from cp_board_blind where bb_relation = 'cp_crew_together') order by cct.ct_idx desc;
